German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

From Europa +‎ -isch.

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ɔʏ̯ʁoˈpɛːɪ̯ʃ/, [ʔɔʏ̯ʁoˈpʰɛːɪ̯ʃ]
  • Audio
    		(file)

Adjective[edit]

europäisch (comparative europäischer, superlative am europäischsten)

  1. European
